# Fortune cookie text alignment (2026-01-29 10:10Z)

_**User**_

The lines of the fortune should be left-aligned in the box, not centered.



---

_**Agent (model default, mode Agent)**_

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>

The user wants the fortune text inside the box to be left-aligned instead of centered. I need to find where this fortune display is rendered - likely in a shell script that shows the fortune in a box with the "âœ¨ Fortune Cookie" title.

I will search for where this box is created and how the text alignment is set.
</details></think>

These MOTD (Message of the Day) programs served administrative purposes - announcing system status, maintenance schedules, or policy updates. These MOTD (Message of the Day) programs served administrative purposes - announcing system status, maintenance schedules, or policy updates. However, creative system administrators and users began adding humorous, inspirational, or thought-provoking content to these messages.\\n\\nThe fortune program concept emerged when users wanted more dynamic, personalized content than static MOTD messages. Rather than displaying the same message to everyone, fortune programs provided random selections from curated databases of quotes, jokes, and sayings.\\n\\n### WAITS and the Fortune Cookie Concept\\n\\nThe Stanford AI Lab Time [... omitted end of long line]"
